abstract: Lou Reed and James Hetfield and Lars Ulrich of Metallica talk about their new album, "Lulu," their seemingly odd collaboration, the importance of "the rock muscle," and their very different approaches to live performances.
snippet: Lou Reed and James Hetfield and Lars Ulrich of Metallica talk about their new album, "Lulu," their seemingly odd collaboration, the importance of "the rock muscle," and their very different approaches to live performances.

headline.main: Q. and A. With Lou Reed and Metallica's James Hetfield and Lars Ulrich
